title: Authoring Tool-Based Learning Course for Intelligent Tutoring System Design (Large-Scale)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic scientific knowledge and proficiency in digital tools
context.additional_context: A course for current practitioners to enhance their ability to design intelligent tutoring systems in science. Focuses on designing and evaluating learning environments using authoring tools without requiring programming knowledge.

learning_goals: Learners can design a simple intelligent tutoring system in the science domain using authoring tools.
Learners can implement a learner-adaptive feedback system through project-based activities.
Learners can analyze the educational effectiveness of designed systems via formative assessment and derive improvement strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
